texts.es: El grupo solidario Arcoíris del amor lo conforman tres microempresarias de éxito, coordinado por Jennifer de 32 años de edad, casada y madre de tres hijos de 12, 6 y 3 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de nacatamales desde hace seis años, solicita el financiamiento a los socios de Kiva para invertir en la compra de maíz, papa, arroz, carne, y vegetales. Con el crédito anterior logro mejorar su vivienda. La segunda socia es Yessenia de 35 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y la tercer socia es Claudia de 26 años propietaria de una pulpería
texts.en: The Arcoíris del Amor solidarity group is made up of three successful micro-entrepreneurs, coordinated by Jennifer, 32 years old, married and the mother of three children, ages 12, 6, and 3. She has worked selling Nicaraguan tamales for the past six years, and she asks the Kiva members for this loan to invest in the purchase of corn, potatoes, rice, meat and vegetables. With the previous loan she managed to improve her house. The second borrower is Yessenia, 35 years old, who works selling cosmetics, and the third borrower is Claudia, 26 years old, the owner of a general store.

loans.use: to purchase corn, potatoes, rice, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru: 20 летный парень из района Хуросон. Сафарали самостоятельный и целеустремленный парень. Он проживает на районе вместе с отцом, матерью, братом и сестрой. Он младший сын в семье. Сафарали учится в университете города Курган-Тюбе. Он уже второй курс. Сафарали учится после обеда, в 12:00 начинается учеба. До занятия Сафарали зарабатывает на жизнь. Он работает в цехе по производства стол стульев и коляски для инвалидов. Сафарали работает и помогает родителям обеспечить семью и зарабатывает на обучения. Он сейчас нуждается в помощи. Сафарали должен оплатить договора за обучения, но у него нет наличия такая сумма.Из-за нехватки  Сафарали запрашивает кредит. Он верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Safarali is a 20-year-old guy from the Khuroson region. He is independent and goal-oriented and lives with his father, mother, brother and sister. He is the youngest son in the family. He is in his second year of studies at the university in the city of Qurgan-tube. He studies after lunch - his classes start at noon - and before that earns money working in a workshop that makes tables, chairs and wheelchairs. He works both to help his parents take care of the family and to earn money for his studies.

Safarali is currently in need of help. He needs to pay his tuition but doesn't have enough money. Therefore he is requesting a loan. He trusts in you and your support.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition

loans.name: Michinnie

texts.en:
Michinnie was raised by a carpenter father. As she grew up, she assisted her father with his carpentry work, especially with making furniture, which has now become a source of income for Michinnie.

Unable to sustain her business due to financial constraints, she signed up to Paglaum MPC for additional capital. Now that she has successfully repaid all her loans without record of default, she is applying for a loan to expand her furniture production. She is requesting PHP 12,500 to purchase lumber, varnish, paints, and carving tools for her furniture making business.

loans.use: to purchase lumber, varnish, paints, and carving tools for her furniture making business.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Rowena works hard to support her family.

She has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Rowena is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more gallons of coconut wine to sell for her coconut wine vending business.

Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more gallons of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Antonio Fernando

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos, lleno de gente amable y solidaria, es un lugar muy turístico, por las diversas cascadas y hosterías y el maravilloso clima.
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio el señor Antonio un hombre luchador de 31 años es casado de esta relación tienen 2 hijos, la esposa le ayuda en el negocio, ellos se dedican a la producción y venta de melcochas y maní dulce de forma ambulante que venden en los buses interprovinciales, ambos se apoyan y son clientes fieles de la institución demostrando voluntad y compromiso de pago. Se iniciaron en esta actividad como vendedores, cuando aprendieron lo necesario se dedicaron de forma independiente, al negocio le dedican un promedio de 10 horas diarias y los sábados y domingos es cuando más horas de trabajo deben realizar por la gran demanda de turistas.
Solicitan el crédito para invertir en el negocio, comprarán materia prima y artefactos eléctricos que les hace falta para incrementar la producción de melcochas y maní dulce, con esta nueva inversión mejorarán sus ingresos económicos y podrán ayudar a que sus hijos se preparen y  tengan un mejor futuro. El señor Antonio agradece a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos, full of friendly and supportive people is a very touristic place due to the variety of waterfalls and inns and the marvelous climate.

Antonio lives and has the business in this canton. He is a determined man, 31 years old, married and in this relationship has 2 children. His wife helps him in the business, they work making and selling candies and candied peanuts as street vendors who sell in the inter-provincial buses. They support each other and they are loyal clients of the institution, showing willingness and commitment with payments. They began this work as salespeople when they learned it was necessary to work independently. They work at the business for an average of 10 hours daily and Saturday and Sunday are when they have to do more hours of work because of the great demand by tourists.

They ask for the loan to invest in the business, they will purchase raw material and electric items that they lack to increase the production of candies and candied peanuts. With this new investment, they will increase their income and be able to help their children study and have a better future. Antonio is grateful to Kiva for the offered support and opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and electric items to make candies.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa, de 44 años de edad, es una mujer muy tranquila y trabajadora, es ama de casa y tiene tres hijos que viven con ellos y su esposo es agricultor. 

Teresa, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, pero ayuda a su esposo en los trabajos de la milpa, ella prepara los alimentos para los trabajadores que le ayudan a su esposo y se los lleva hasta donde trabajan.

Teresa, necesita el préstamo para pagarle a los mozos y pagar el alquiler de la maquina para desgranar maíz. 

Teresa, sueña con tener una buena cosecha, para pasar una navidad tranquila y poder seguir trabajando el próximo año.
texts.en:
Teresa, 44 years old, is a calm and hardworking woman. She is the head of her household and has three children that live with her. Her husband is a farmer.

Teresa, dedicates her time to household duties, but she also helps her husband in the work in the corn fields. She prepares food for the workers that help her husband and brings it to them where they work.

Teresa, needs this loan in order to pay the laborers and to rent the machine that shucks the corn. Her dream is to have a good crop, to have a good Christmas holiday, and to continue working next year.

loans.use: to pay the laborers and to pay to rent the machine to shuck corn.

loans.name: Iris

texts.en:
Iris is a businesswoman who earns through the retailing of various ready-to-wear clothing items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance.

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 64 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed with three adult children. For his means of living, he has been engaged in a sand and gravel quarrying business for more than 10 years already, and earns approximately 12,000 PHP each month doing this type of work.

Mario has requested a loan to purchase marine boards, epoxy, nails and paints to repair the sampan (boat carrier for transport) he uses in his sand and gravel quarrying business. Mario has been a member of PMPC for four years already.

In the future, Mario hopes to expand his sand and gravel quarrying business by acquiring additional sampans.

loans.use: to purchase marine boards, epoxy, nails and paints.

loans.name: Cherri Nohemi

texts.es: La señora Cherri, tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, y vive junto a ellos en una aldea del Municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Ella trabajó por un tiempo en una maquila y con sus propios esfuerzos hace 4 años decidió poner su propio negocio que le generara mejores ingresos para sus hijos. Ofrece los servicios de corte de pelo, secado, aplanchado, peinados, tintes, manicure etc. ademas de vender productos como uñas acrilicas, cepillos, maquillajes y otros. Este salón de belleza lo tiene en la zona del mercado en un local que alquila.  Ella solicita la cantidad de 15,000 Lempiras para la compra de productos de belleza como tintes, champú, tratamientos, maquillajes, esmaltes, cremas, y otros materiales que utiliza y vende en su salon de belleza. Con esta inversión pretende satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y ofrecer un mejor servicio. Su meta es Ampliar su negocio y seguir educando a sus hijos.
texts.en: Cherri is 39 years old, a single mother, she has 3 children and lives with them in a town in the municipality of Tela, Atlántida. She worked for a while at a factory and with her own efforts, 4 years ago she decided to establish her own business that will generate more income for her children. She offers services of haircuts, drying, straightening, hairstyles, dyes, manicures, etc. in addition to selling products such as acrylic nails, combs, make up and more. This beauty salon is in the market zone in a space she rents. She asks for the quantity of 15,000 lempiras to purchase beauty products such as dyes, shampoo, treatments, makeup, nail polish, creams, and other materials that she uses and sells at her beauty salon. With this investment, she plans to satisfy her customers' needs and offer better service. Her goal is to expand her business and continue educating her children.

loans.use: to purchase products such as dyes, shampoo, make up, treatments, nail polish, creams, and other materials that she uses and sells in her beauty salon.

loans.name: Yeber Orlando

texts.es:
San Miguel de Los Bancos en este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio el señor Yeber un hombre luchador de 38 años mantiene una sólida relación de casado fruto de esta relación tienen dos hijos, él y su esposa se dedican a la producción de leche, esta actividad la aprendió junto a sus Padres ya que siempre vivieron en el campo le dedican un promedio de 8 horas diarias entre el ordeño y el mantenimiento de la finca.
Este crédito lo invertirán en la compra de una vaca lechera y  mejorar sus ingresos económicos para darles un mejor futuro a sus 2 hijos y a su esposa, el señor Yeber agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
San Miguel de Los Bancos. In this canton, Yeber lives and has his business. Yeber is a determined man, 38 years old, who is in a solid married relationship. From this relationship, they have two children. He and his wife work making milk, he learned this work from his parents since they always lived in the countryside. They work for an average of 8 hours daily between the milking and maintaining the farm.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of a dairy cow and to improve his income to give his 2 children and his wife a better future. Yeber is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and the offered opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow and improve his income to give his children a better future.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 35-year-old, married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of one child.

Her husband owns a business in which his practice is to buy fabrics from wholesalers, dye them into multi shades, sew them into garments and sell them in the market. He has lot of customers who like to buy garments from him. Due to new customers, the demand is increasing day by day, but he does not have a sufficient amount to buy more fabrics.

Therefore, Razia requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner’s BRAC Pakistan so that her husband can buy more fabrics to fulfill the demand.

She is in her third loan cycle and has shown an excellent repayment behavior; she has already been taking the loan from BRAC and investing in the business.

Razia is very thankful to the Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more fabrics for her husband's garment business.

loans.name: Elpedio

texts.en:
Elpedio is 46 years old and married with school-age children. He has run and operated a hog raising business in Pari-an, Enrique Villanueva, Siquejor, for almost 10 years. This business has supported the needs of his family, and he is willing to make it more productive so that he can send all his children to school until they finish college and land a good job.

His business was supported by his loans from Paglaum MPC, where he is a microfinance member. Recently, he took his sixth loan to purchase bags of animal feeds and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feeds and vitamins

loans.name: Gaudioso

texts.en:
Gaudioso is 59 years old, single and a farmer in Cang-inte, Siquijor. He is a vegetable grower in his place and is known as one of the major suppliers of vegetables to the local market.

Recently, he took a loan to purchase vegetables seeds and bags of fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables seeds and bags of fertilizers.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is 23 years old. She is married with one child.

She has been operating an M-pesa (mobile money transfer) business for nine years. She will be using the loan to open a new retail shop and hopes this will help her to expand her M-pesa shop.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to provide well for her family and educate her child well.

She is in her third loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 100,000.

loans.use: to open a new retail shop.

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is 65 years old and married with six adult children. Felomina has managed her own sari-sari (variety) store business for many years with the help of her husband.

She joined and became a member of GDMPC in 2008. Recently, she borrowed a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional stock for her sari-sari store to increase her inventory to have more sales so that she can earn more income.

Felomina's future plan is to expand her business so that she can have more income to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is a married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a chemist shop. He has been involved in this business for four years. His primary customers are honest.

He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of medicine. He hopes that in the future, he will have two other branches.

This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of medicine.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 51 years old and married with four children.

Vilma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Vilma has borrowed and paid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from tailoring.

Vilma aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Saikal

texts.ru: Сайкал, 25 года, не замужем. У Сайкал среднее образование, сельским хозяйством занимается с 2010 года. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть корова и 10 овец. Также на 0,22 Га земли Сайкал выращивает огурцы для реализации. Ежемесячный доход Сайкал составляет в среднем 8,000 сом (KGS). Сайкал обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Сайкал планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Saikal is 25 years old and unmarried. Saikal has a secondary education and has worked in agriculture since 2010. Today her farm has a cow and ten sheep. Also, she has .22 hectares of land where Saikal grows cucumbers for sale. Saikal's monthly income averages 8,000 som (KGS). Saikal asked the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle.  Saikal plans to use her profit from loan to further development her business, and she wants to save money for home repairs.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to invest in her business and increase her herd

loans.name: Jose Donaldo

texts.es: José, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en Morazán Yoro junto a su esposa y 3 hijos. José siempre se ha dedicado a la producción de granos básicos con el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Lleva 10 años de cultivar en su propio terreno produciendo maíz y frijoles para vender, siendo esta actividad su única fuente de ingresos. El préstamo que solicita es el cuarto ciclo y es por la cantidad de 13,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar insumos como abonos y semillas para cultivar 3 manzanas de maíz y una de frijoles y darle buena asistencia, esta inversión le ayudara a aumentar la producción y mejores ingresos económicos. Su meta es ampliar la zona de sus cultivos y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose, who is 36 years old, lives in Morazan Yoro with his wife and 3 children. Jose has always worked in the production of basic grains, by farming corn and beans. He has been farming his own land for 10 years, producing corn and beans to sell. This occupation is his only source of income. The loan he asks for is in the fourth cycle, and it is for the amount of 13,000 Lempiras. With this, he will buy inputs, such as fertilizers and seeds, to farm 3 manzanas (a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters or 1.728 acres) of corn and one of beans, and give it good maintenance. This investment will help him to increase production and have a better economic income.
His goal is to expand the area of his crops and give a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy inputs, such as fertilizers and seeds, to farm corn and beans, and give them good maintenance.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is known in Tulapos, Enrique, for her R-T-W (ready-to-wear clothing) sales. She's been doing this type of business to support her husband in responding to their growing family needs. She accessed her initial capital from Paglaum MPC upon her membership.

This time she needs to buy additional inventories of clothing for sale, and for that, she asks for a loan from Paglaum MPC.

loans.use: to buy additional inventories of clothing for sale.

loans.name: Solly

texts.en:
Solly finds her retailing business easy to manage because she only displays her goods and waits for customers to buy. It is also easy to gain income through this business knowing that she sells consumable goods that are commonly used in a household.

Her business is financed by Paglaum MPC, where she is a MIGS (Member in Good Standing) member. The need of additional capital for her business pushes Solly to ask for her seventh loan to restock her store with consumable goods such as noodles, canned goods, coffee, milk, confectioneries, condiments and others.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable goods such as noodles, canned goods, coffee, milk, confectioneries, condiments and others.

loans.name: Margarita Dolores

texts.es:
En el sector Limón afuera, parroquia del cantón Portoviejo en Ecuador,  existe una extensa área dedicada a cultivos de choclo acompañado de pequeños sembríos como maní, cilantro, habas, tomate. Un lugar lleno de riqueza natural, aquí se reúnen cada 15 días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres.
En este lugar vive la señora Margarita, tiene 48  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro  hijos, tres mayores de edad y una hija  de 13 años de edad la misma que estudia en colegio, dos de sus hijos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo es Agricultor.
Doña Margarita es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado ganarse la vida con su esfuerzo, es así que hace mas de 20 años con lo que tenia surtió una pequeña tienda en su casa, empezó con muy poco y después con la ayuda de los créditos fue surtiendo aun mas su local, actualmente también vende artículos de bazar, papelería y helados,  trabaja todos los días y  casi todo el día porque su negocio está en su casa y allí mientras está atenta a su hogar también a los clientes tratando de brindar la mejor atención ya que esto le ha ayudado a mejorar su clientela.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar víveres de primera necesidad, helados entre otras cosas que necesita. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia por eso lucha día a día.
texts.en:
In the outskirts of Limón, a parish in the canton of Portoviejo in Ecuador, there is an extensive area dedicated to growing sweet corn, along with small fields of peanuts, cilantro, broad beans, and tomato. It is a place full of natural richness, and here the members of the Madres Alegres loan group meet every two weeks.

In this place, Margarita lives. She is 48 years old, married, and in this relationship they have four children, three adults and a daughter who is 13 years old and goes to school. Two of the children still live in their house. Her husband is a farmer.

Margarita is a woman who has always liked to earn a living with her own efforts and so it was that over 20 years ago, with what she had, she stocked a small store in her house. She began with very little and after, with the help of the loans, she stocked her space even more. Currently, she also sells small items, paper goods and ice cream. She works every day and almost the whole day because her business is in her house and there, while she tends to the home, she also serves her customers, trying to offer the best service since with this it has helped her to improve her clientele.

This loan will be used to stock her store more, she will purchase basic groceries, ice creams, and other things she needs. She has been in the loan group since the beginning and she likes it because, with the loans, she gets ahead. Her dreams are to give her family the best, for this she struggles day to day.

loans.use: to purchase basic groceries, ice creams, etc.

loans.name: Rodolfo Manuel

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados vive Rodolfo, un señor de 36 años, habita juntamente con su esposa y su hija quien actualmente está cursando la secundaria.
Rodolfo cuenta con una pequeña finca donde produce cacao y plátano, todas las semanas  limpia la producción y cosecha los frutos para sacarlos a la venta. Su esposa también es de mucho apoyo, ella siempre le acompaña y le ayuda en las labores. Rodolfo y su familia hace casi dos años vivan en Italia donde trabajaron muy duro pero decidieron regresar porque ya querían estar cerca de los suyos y vivir en su país natal, con ello pudo comprar la finca que tiene y construir su casa. 
Ahora Rodolfo y su esposa han tenido un sueño, que juntos lo han plasmado y están in vertiendo poco a poco para iniciar con su microempresa, ellos desean criar chanchos, por ello acudieron a la Fundación porque  es la única institución que apoya a los emprendedores con sueños, gracias a este crédito Rodolfo podrá construir la chanchera, comprar cemento, zinc, bloques y demás ya que tienen el capital para los animales.
Se siente feliz y agradecido con KIVA por apoyarlos a salir adelante y comenzar con un negocio adicional.
texts.en:
In the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados lives Rodolfo, a 36 year old man who lives with his wife and daughter, who is a student in high school.

Rodolfo has a small farm where he produces cocoa and plantains. Every week he collects some produce to sell. His wife supports him a lot. She always accompanies him and helps him with his work. Rodofo and his family lived in Italy almost two years ago, where they worked very hard but decided to return to be closer to their family and live in their native country. With this loan Rodolfo can pay for his farm and build his house.

Now, Rodolfo and his wife have dreamed that together they have expressed and are investing in little by little: to open a small business. They hope to raise pigs. For this reason, they have come to the Fundación. It is the only institution that supports small business owners with dreams. Thanks to this loan, Rodolfo will be able to build a pig pen, buy cement, zinc, cinder blocks, and other materials he needs because they already have the capital needed to buy animals.

Rodolfo is happy and grateful to Kiva for the support in starting his new business.

loans.use: to raise pigs, build a pig pen, and diversify the production on his farm that he has worked so hard for.

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 62 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 5 детей. У нее - среднее образование, сейчас на пенсии. Саламат знает конкретно чего хочет и добивается всего своими силами. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 7,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Саламат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 18,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Саламат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Саламат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Salamat is 62 years old and married. She and her husband raised 5 children. She has a secondary education and is now retired. Salamat knows exactly what she wants and working toward it. The primary source of income for her family is her work in animal husbandry. She started 30 years ago when she bought 7,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle. Because of her hard work. Salamat's farm now has two cows. Her monthly income is 18,000 som (KGS). In order to further development the farm, Salamat asked the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy heifers to increase her livestock. Salamat plans to invest profit from the loan into expanding her herd.

loans.use: to buy one heifer in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Bright Group

texts.en:
Catherine, who is in her late 30s, is a widow with three children; two of them are in school and one is still small. She has been running a business of electronic money transfers (M-pesa and Tigo Pesa) for six years now. She works from 6:30 a.m. to 6:45 p.m. daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Catherine's 18th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase her business stock of electronic money transfers and has managed to pay back all her loans successfully.

She is doing great with her loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group, which is also doing great with their loan. She used the profit to pay school fees, to repay the loan, bought a plot of land, reinvested in her business, bought a TV set and a radio and covered household expenses.

She will use this loan to increase electronic money transfers (M-pesa and Tigo Pesa). She dreams of owning another shop for the same business.

Catherine will share this loan with her loan group, Bright, which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase capital for electronic money transfers (M-pesa and Tigo Pesa).

loans.name: Gloria Hermelinda

texts.es:
La socia continua  dedicándose al negocio de hacer manteles y servilletas de telas, la socia lleva años dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una mujer responsable, la socia espera que mediante su negocio pueda obtener más ganancias para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar telas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida  con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.
texts.en:
Gloria continues to work at her business making fabric tablecloths and napkins. She's had this business for years and she's done well due to the effort she puts everyday in her work. She is a responsible woman who hopes to generate more income with her business so she can continue to support her family.

She requests the loan to buy fabrics and other supplies.

She is very grateful for the loan and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: buy fabrics and other supplies.

loans.name: Brigida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Brigida, de 36 años de edad, está soltera, aún no tiene hijos, pero le gustaría llegar a tener su propio hijo y ella vive en casa de sus padres en el campo. 

Brigida, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, pero también administra una pequeña tienda en casa, la cual atiende todos los días, gracias a su tienda ha podido salir adelante con los gastos de la casa.

Brigida, necesita el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, frijoles, pan y detergente para vender. 

Los sueños de Brigida, son establecer un buen negocio y tener su propia familia.
texts.en:
Brigida, 36 years old, is single and has no children yet, but she would like to have children. She lives with her parents in the countryside.

Brigida dedicates her time to household duties, but she also runs a small store, which she attends to every day. Thanks to her store, she has been able to help with her household expenses.

Brigida needs this loan in order to buy corn, sugar, beans, bread, and detergent to sell. Her dreams are to open a good business and to have her own family.

loans.use: to buy corn, sugar, beans, bread, and detergent to sell.

loans.name: Melodia

texts.en:
Melodia has been engaged in a farming business for 20 years together with her husband. She's doing so well in her chosen business that she's able to send her children to school.

She's aware that she needs to double her production to support her children in college. She asks from Paglaum MPC an amount to augment her production. She needs to purchase bags of fertilizers for her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers.

loans.name: Damira

texts.ru: Дамира, 25 лет, замужем, есть дочь, ей 5 лет. У Дамиры среднее образование, она занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть  4 коровы, 7 овец, лошадь, также земельный надел мерою 2,80 ГА, где она выращивает фасоль, также занимается садоводством, выращивая фруктовые деревья - яблони. Супруг помогает Дамире в ведении ее бизнеса. Дамира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 105,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для обработки почвы и выращивания органической продукции. Своевременная обработка почвы приведет к увеличению объемов сбора урожая и увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Дамира планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса за счет покупки 2 коров.
texts.en: Damira is 25 years old, married and has a five-year-old daughter. Damira has a secondary education, and she works in agriculture. The farm has 4 cows, seven sheep, a horse, and a 2.80 hectare plot of land where she grows beans. She also has an apple orchard. Her husband helps Damira with the business. Damira asked the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 105,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer to grow organic products. Enriching the soil in a timely fashion will increase the volume of the harvest and increase the family's funds. Damira plans to invest her profit from the loan into further developing her business by buying two cows.

loans.use: buy fertilizer to cultivate her land and grow organic products.

loans.name: Manuela Virginia

texts.es:
En el sector Limón afuera, parroquia del cantón Portoviejo en Ecuador,  existe una extensa área dedicada a cultivos de choclo acompañado de pequeños sembríos como maní, cilantro, habas, tomate. Un lugar lleno de riqueza natural, aquí se reúnen cada 15 días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres.
En este lugar vive la señora Manuela, tiene 23 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos  hijos de 6 y 2 años  de edad,  el mayor estudia en escuela. Ella vive sola con sus hijos.
Doña Manuela es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta a base de esfuerzo ganar lo suyo para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella se dedica a varias actividades, vende ropa por catalogo, artículos para el hogar a través del sistema de cartillas, productos naturales y de Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella aprovecha las horas de la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos, deja a crédito y cobra semanalmente, son 5 años que lleva con este negocio el cual le permite sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, artículos para el hogar, perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos y cremas. Lleva  2 ciclos en el Grupo Crédito y le gusta la unidad del grupo. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the sector Limon, in the parish of the region of Portoviejo in Ecuador, there is an extensive area dedicated to farming corn, alongside smaller crops of peanuts, cilantro, broad beans, and tomatoes. In this place filled with natural wealth, the loan group Madres Alegres meets every 15 days.
Here lives Manuela, she is 23 years old, and she is a single mother with two sons who are 6 and 2 years old. The older one goes to school. She lives alone with her children.
She is a very hard-working woman who likes to earn her keep based on her effort. To help her children get ahead she works in various occupations. She sells clothing by catalog, items for the home through a system of saving books, natural products and items from Avon (beauty items, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She sells door to door. She takes advantage of the morning hours, because at that time it is easier to make her rounds. She sells on credit and collects on a weekly basis. She has had this business for 5 years, which allows her to help her children get ahead.
She will use this loan to buy clothing, items for the home, perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, and creams. She has had two cycles with the loan group, and she likes how united the group is. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy clothing, items for the home, perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, and creams.

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.es:
La socia  Ricardina pertenece al banco comunal  CHASKA ÑAHUI, la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de comida, la socia es una mujer responsable, la socia espera que mediante su negocio pueda obtener más ganancias para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia se siente agradecida  con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas, la socia se siente agradecida con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite entre otros.
texts.en:
The member Ricardina belongs to the communal bank Chaska Ñahui. She still works in the business of selling food. She is a responsible woman. She hopes that through her business she can obtain more profits, and in this way continue supporting her family. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to paying the fees.
She is asking for the loan to buy rice, oil, among others.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, among others.

loans.name: Zhamiyla

texts.ru: Жамийла, 52 года, замужем, есть 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Жамийлы, на сегодняшний день у нее имеется 0,56 ГА собственного земельного надела, где она ежегодно выращивает картофель и кукурузу для реализации. Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 7 овец. Ежемесячный доход от сельскохозяйственной деятельности составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жамийла обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для покупки овец для разведения. Жамийла намерена направлять доходы на развитие своего бизнеса и покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Zhamiyla is 52 years old, married, has 3 children. She has a secondary education and works farming and keeping livestock. Because of her hard work and dedication, Zhamiyla also has a 0.56 hectare plot where she grows potatoes and corn to sell. She also has two cows and seven sheep. Her monthly income from agricultural activities is about 20,000 som (KGS). In order to further her farm, Zhamiyla asked the bank Bai-Tushum for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep for breeding. Zhamiyla intends invest profits back into her business and purchase furniture for the home.

loans.use: buy sheep

loans.name: Klara

texts.ru: Клара, 53 года, замужем, мать 3 детей, они взрослые, живут отдельно. У Клары среднее образование, работает уборщицей, также в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, вместе с супругом занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1995 году, они с мужем накопили на покупку двух дойных коров. Благодаря упорному труду, Клара на сегодняшний день имеет 1 корову и 5 овец. Производит и продает молоко и молочные продукты (сметану, творог, айран) местным жителям и горожанам. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Клара обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку сена и корма для скота, а также овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, она планирует накопить на покупку нового аппарата для производства сметаны.
texts.en: Klara is 53 years old, married and the mother of 3 adult children who live on their own. Klara has a secondary education. She works as a cleaner to earn additional income for the family. She and her husband have been keeping livestock and farming since 1995 when they bought two dairy cows. Because of her hard work, Klara currently has one cow and five sheep. She produces and sells milk and dairy products such as sour cream, cottage cheese, and ayran (a cultured dairy drink). In order to further develop their business, Klara turned to the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy hay, fodder, and sheep. She plans to invest profits back into her business, and she plans to save up to buy a new machine to make sour cream.

loans.use: to buy hay and feed for livestock.

loans.name: Humberto Francisco

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos un Cantón hermoso , muchos turistas Nacionales y extranjeros visitan este Cantón por su maravillosas cascadas una de ellas es la cascada del amor , aledaños a este Cantón tenemos varios recintos uno de ellos es el recinto Los Andes en el mismo vive y tiene el negocio el señor Humberto un hombre luchador de 32 años es soltero padre de una niña de 4 años quien vive con él, Don Humberto se dedica a la producción de cerdos y lechones gracias a este negocio y al trabajo que tiene como docente está saliendo adelante, entre el empleo y negocio trabaja un promedio de 10 horas diarias durante las mañanas recibe la ayuda de su Padre quien le ayuda dando de comer a los cerdos mientras él regresa de la escuela en la que trabaja. 
Del negocio de los cerdos aprendió en su niñez junto con los papas, solicita este crédito para arreglar, ampliar las chancheras para incrementar la producción, con esta nueva inversión mejoraran sus ingresos económicos y podrá seguir dando a su hija lo mejor, el señor Humberto agradece a Fundación Alternativa y  Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos is a beautiful canton that many foreign and national tourists visit for its wonderful waterfalls one of which is the waterfall of love. The canton has several precincts and one of them is the precinct of Los Andes where Humberto lives and has his business. Humberto is a hard working 32 year old single father who has a 4 year old daughter who lives with him.

Humberto earns a living from pig and piglet production. Thanks to this business, and his job as a teacher, he is doing well and he works an average of 10 hours a day between his job and the business. He gets help from his father in the mornings who feeds the pigs as Humberto returns from the school where he works.

He learned about pig production in childhood from his parents and is applying for a loan to repair and expand pig pens in order to increase production. This new investment will improve his income and he can continue providing the best for his daughter. Humberto thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and the opportunities provided.

loans.use: to expand pig pens in order to increase production and he will therefore be able to continue providing the best for his daughter.

loans.name: Denny Margarita

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sucre se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Denny, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen  cuatro hijos de 20, 16, 12 y  10  años de edad, todos estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Denny es una mujer que le gusta de cualquier forma ganarse la vida y es por eso que ella se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa en general, productos de Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas) y agua en bidón, en su casa  tiene su depósito de aguas y también realiza recargas de varias operadoras con lo cual se gana muy buenos ingresos. Con la ayuda de los créditos  ella comenzó esta actividad y cada que puede la va mejorando, a comprado vitrinas en las cuales exhibe sus productos los cuales le facilitan sus ventas,  ella deja a créditos  y cobra semanalmente, lleva más de 5 años con sus negocios. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas y agua.  Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan en su negocio. Sus sueños es darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The loan group Sucre meets every fifteen days in the region of Montecristi, known for its rich precolonial culture, and for its handicrafts, which are recognized at a national and international level. It is the place of the famous hats made of straw.
Here lives Denny, she is 40 years old, she is married, and from this relationship she has four children who are 20, 16, 12, and 10 years old. They all study at university, high school, or primary school. Her husband is a driver.
Denny is a woman who likes to earn her living. This is why she works in retail. She sells clothes in general, Beicorp products (beauty items, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories) and also water in large cans. In her house she has her own water deposit, and she also does refills with large operators, with which she makes a very good income.
With the help of the loans she started this occupation, and every time she can she improves it, buying displays where she exhibits her products, which make her sales easier. She sells on credit, and collects on a weekly basis. She has had her businesses for more than 5 years.
She will use this loan to buy clothing, perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, and water. She has been with the loan group from the beginning, and she likes it because the loan helps her in her business. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy clothing, perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, and water.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 62 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with four children now at their adult age. Cresencia earns her living from her hog and poultry raising business. She has been engaged in this business for two years already. She earns approximately 2,000 PHP each month, and that amount is so helpful to meet her needs.

She has requested a loan to purchase two additional piglets, 24 chicks and two sacks of booster and grower feeds for her hog and poultry raising business. Cresencia has been a member of PMPC for almost four years.

In the future, Cresencia hopes to expand her hog and poultry raising business and to become one of the suppliers in the area.

loans.use: to purchase two additional piglets, 24 chicks and two sacks of booster and grower feeds.

loans.name: Barchynai

texts.ru: Барчынай, 25 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Барчынай среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Барчынай, на данный момент есть корова, на 0,15 Га земли выращивает кукурузу для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Барчынай обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Barchynai is 25 years old, married, and the mother of 2 children. Barchynai has a secondary education. Her primary source of income is livestock and farming. Because of her hard work, Barchynai now has a cow and 0.15 hectares of land where she grow corn. In order to further develop her business, Barchynai asked the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase her herd. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase one cow.

loans.name: Marget

texts.en:
Marget is a 33-year-old woman and mother of one child. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a fruit seller by profession and he sells fruits like apples, bananas, grapes, etc. Her husband is solely responsible to feed the entire family and manage the household.

Marget's husband needs to purchase different types of fruits for reselling purposes so that her husband can increase the size of business, improve his sales growth and earn maximum profit. But due to an unfavorable financial position, her husband is not in condition to purchase the fruits.
.
Therefore Marget has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for his business purpose.

Marget is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's fruit business

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  CHASKA ÑAHUI, el socio sigue  dedicándose a ejercer su profesión  como médico, él socio es una persona responsable el socio espera poder continuar trabajando en su consultorio para de esta forma continuar apoyando a su familia, el socio continua  con su  consultorio médico donde trabaja y puede atender a todos sus clientes que le solicitan.
El socio solicita el crédito para hacer algunos arreglos en su consultorio.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Chaska Ñahui. He continues working in his profession as a doctor. He is a responsible person, and he hopes to be able to continue working in his medical practice and in this way continue supporting his family. He continues with his medical consult where he works, and he can attend to all clients who ask fro him
The member asks for a loan to make some repairs to his doctor's office.

loans.use: to make some repairs to his doctor's office.

loans.name: Luz Aurora

texts.es:
La socia Luz Marina pertenece al banco comunal  CHASKA ÑAHUI,la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de consultorio médico, ella es cesante de enfermería , la socia es una mujer responsable, la socia espera que mediante su negocio pueda obtener más ganancias para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia se siente agradecida  con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas, la socia se siente agradecida con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.
La socia solicita el crédito para hacer algunos arreglos en su consultorio.
texts.en:
The partner Luz Marina belongs to the communal bank CHASKA ÑAHUI. The partner continues making a living in the medical clinic business. She is an unemployed nurse. The partner is a responsible woman. She hopes that through her business she will be able to earn more and in this way continue supporting her family.

She feels grateful for the loan and she promises to make her payments.

The partner requests the loan to make some repairs in her clinic.

loans.use: to make some repairs in her office.

loans.name: Ruth Miriam

texts.es:
La socia Ruth continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes don expende gran variedad de productos. Ella es muy trabajadora y responsable y está logrando sacar adelante a su familia como toda madre luchadora.
La socia desea continuar expendiendo su negocio por eso solicito el préstamo para comprar gaseosas, aceite, fideos y golosinas.
Ruth está muy agradecida y contenta con el préstamo y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Ruth continues with her business of a small grocery store where she sells a large variety of products. She is very hard-working and responsible, and she is managing to help her family get ahead, like every other determined mother.
She wishes to continue expanding her business. This is why she asked for the loan, to buy sodas, oil, noodles, and candy.
She is very grateful and happy with the loan, and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sodas, oil, noodles, and candy.

loans.name: Mae

texts.en: Mae runs and operates an internet cafe in Cangomantong, Lazi, Siquijor. She is supported by her loan availments from Paglaum MPC. Recently, she asked for a loan from the cooperative to pay for repairs and maintenance of computer units.

loans.use: to pay for repairs and maintenance of computer units

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo pertenece al banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián”, él socio sigue trabajando como coordinador de entrega de combustible además crea programas informáticos, el socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, el socio es una persona responsable el cual espera mediante su  trabajo poder obtener más ganancias para de esta forma poder continuar apoyando a su familia,a la vez sigue con su negocio de internet.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de una maquina.
texts.en:
Ricardo belongs to the communal bank Patron de San Sebastian. He continues working as a coordinator distributing fuel. He also creates computer programs. He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making the payments. He is a responsible person who, through his work, hopes to be able to obtain a bigger income and in this way be able to keep supporting his family. He also continues with his Internet business.
He is asking for the loan to buy a computer.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Laura Estela

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sucre se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Laura, tiene 59 años de edad, está separada pero  de esa relación tuvo tres hijos, todos ya  mayores de edad, uno de ellos  aun vive con ella.
Doña Laura es una mujer que le toca trabajar muy duro para salir adelante, para esto ella con la ayuda de su primer crédito que recibió del grupo adecuo un local en su casa donde surtió una pequeña tienda de víveres, la misma que con el paso del tiempo ha ido mejorando, actualmente tiene muy bien surtida su tienda y a además de víveres también vende carnes, legumbres, útiles escolares entre otros. Gracias los créditos ella puede salir adelante y ha ganado más clientela ya que ha podido satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes quienes a diario asisten a su local a comprar sus víveres.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir su tienda, va a comprar víveres, útiles escolares y muchos otros productos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque por los créditos ella sale adelante. Sus sueños son seguir adelante mejorando su vida.
texts.en:
The Grupo De Crédito Sucre (Sucre Loan Group) meets every 15 days in the Montecristi region, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its artisans, which are recognized at a national and international level. It is the home of famous straw hats.

In this place lives Señora Laura, who is 59 years old, separated but with three children from that relationship. They are all adults, one of them still lives with her.

Doña Laura is a woman who has to work very hard in order to get ahead, because of this with the help of the first loan she received from the group she tailored a store in her house where stocked a small supply, the same one that with the passage of time has been improving. She currently has stocked her store very well, and in addition to supplies she sells meat, vegetables, school supplies, among other things.

Thanks to the loans she can get ahead and she has earned more clientele now that she has been able to satisfy the needs of her clients who attend her store daily to buy their supplies.

She is going to use this loan to stock her store. She is going to buy supplies, school supplies, and many other products. This is since she joined the Grupo De Crédito (Loan Group) and she likes it because the loans get her ahead. Her dreams are to get ahead and continue improving her life.

loans.use: to buy supplies, school supplies, etc.

loans.name: Luzmenda

texts.en: Luzmenda is 61 years old, single and lives in Cabal-asan, Maria, Siquijor. She has a hog raising business which supports her needs. She is also an active member of Paglaum MPC that supports her business. Recently, she availed a loan to purchase bags of animal feeds.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feeds

loans.name: Sindy Deyanira

texts.es:
En el sector Limón afuera, parroquia del cantón Portoviejo en Ecuador,  existe una extensa área dedicada a cultivos de choclo acompañado de pequeños sembríos como maní, cilantro, habas, tomate. Un lugar lleno de riqueza natural, aquí se reúnen cada 15 días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres.
En este lugar vive la señora Sindy, tiene 20 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de 4 años de edad, el niño está en jardín de infantes. El marido es comerciante.
Doña Sindy es una mujer que le gusta colaborar con algo y así facilitar el trabajo de su marido, es por eso que ella realiza el crédito para que él lo utilice en su labor, el se dedica al comercio,  tiene un local en el mercado en Portoviejo donde vende frutas y  legumbres, el trabaja todos los días ya  que es la única forma que tiene para ganarse la vida y satisfacer las necesidades en su hogar, lleva más de 6 años con este negocio el cual les permite ganarse la vida.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar frutas y legumbres. Lleva 5 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos  porque ella le puede ayudar a su marido. Sus sueños son tener un local en su casa.
texts.en:
Throughout the region of Limon, township of the Portoviejo Canton in Ecuador, there is an extensive area consecrated to growing corn, alongside  smaller patches of peanuts, cilantro, beans and tomatoes. In this place of great natural beauty the members of the group Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres get together every 15 days. 

Sindy lives here. She is 20 years old and lives with a domestic partner, with whom she has a 4-year-old son, currently in kindergarten. Her domestic partner is a tradesman. Sindy is a woman who likes to contribute something, making her partner's job easier. For this reason she is requesting this loan to be used in his work. 

As a salesman he owns a shop in the Portoviejo market, where he sells fruits and vegetables. He works every day, since it is the only way to earn a living and satisfy their household needs. He has been in this business for over 6 years. 

The loan will be used to buy fruits and vegetables. She has had 5 loan cycles with the group and she likes it because it allows her to help her partner. Her dream is to have a shop in her home.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en: Kennedy is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a retail business where he sells cereals. He has been involved in this business for ten years. His primary customers are honest. He describes his biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. He will use the KES 100,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to  expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals.

loans.name: Common End S.h.g Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand is Elizabeth. She is 35 years old, married and blessed with two children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2015 to benefit from enterprise development and financial management training. This improved her knowledge in business and financial management hence keeping good records and using her income prudently.

She operates a kiosk and grocery business and she is borrowing a Kiva loan to add stock to her grocery so as to meet her customers' demands. She believes that will help her earn more income to cater to her family's needs such as food and clothing.

Elizabeth is grateful to Kiva for the help and support.

loans.use: to add stock to her grocery shop so as to meet her customers' demands.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
En el sector Limón afuera, parroquia del cantón Portoviejo en Ecuador,  existe una extensa área dedicada a cultivos de choclo acompañado de pequeños sembríos como maní, cilantro, habas, tomate. Un lugar lleno de riqueza natural, aquí se reúnen cada 15 días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres.
En este lugar vive don José, tiene 50 años de edad, hace varios años su querida esposa falleció pero de esa relación tiene seis hijos mayor de edad e independientes.
Don José es un hombre muy trabajador que le gusta ganarse la vida honradamente, el siempre ha trabajado de albañil pero el trabajo en ocasiones escasea y es por eso que el con unos ahorros que tenia y después con la ayuda de los créditos construyo un galpón en el cual se dedica a la cría de pollos, el compra los pollos cuando aun están pequeños y luego los mantiene por espacio de dos a tres meses,  después el  los vende a comerciantes o entrega a vecinos del lugar, de esta forma el logra sus ingresos que le ayudan a sobrevivir aun cuando no labora como albañil. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar pollos y alimentos para que se desarrollen más rápido. Lleva 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños es contar con buena salud.
texts.en:
In the outskirts of Limón, a parish in the canton Portoviejo en Ecuador, there exists an extensive area dedicated to the cultivation of corn, along with small fields of peanuts, cilantro, beans, and tomatoes. Here in this place full of natural richness, the members of the loan group "Madres Alegres" get together every 15 days. 
Don José lives in this place and is 50 years old. Several years ago his beloved wife passed away, but from this relationship he has 6 adult children who are independent. Don José is a very hard-working man who likes to earn a living honestly. He has always worked in construction, but the work is sometimes scarce. This is why, with some savings that he had and later with the help of the loans, he built a shed in which he raises chickens. He purchases the chickens when they are still small and he keeps them for 2 or 3 months. After that he sells them to merchants or delivers them to neighbors. This is the way he earns an income to survive even when he is not working in construction.
He will use this loan to purchase chickens and feed so that they grow more quickly. He has been in the loan group for 2 years, and he enjoys it because the loans help him a lot. His dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and feed.

loans.name: Cristhian David

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sucre que se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive don Cristhian, tiene 25 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tiene un hijo de 13 meses el cual es su adoración. Su mujer estudia en la universidad.
Don Cristhian es un hombre que le gusta a base de esfuerzo sacar adelante a su familia, el tiene un local en el centro de la ciudad donde vende teléfonos, accesorios y recargas, ya son 8 años  que tienen su local y las ventas son muy buenas ya que el compra directamente de proveedores mayoristas más barato y también venden a muy buen precio lo cual le deja mejores ingresos que le dan para seguir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar teléfonos, repuestos y  accesorios telefónicos. Lleva 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños son tener un  local más grande.
texts.en:
The loan group Sucre meets every day in the region of Montecristi, known for its rich precolonial cultural and for its handicrafts, which are recognized at the national and international level. It is the place of the famous hats made of straw.
Here lives Cristhian, who is 25 years old. He is married and from this relationship he has a son who is 13 months whom he adores. His wife studies at university.
Cristhian is a man who likes to help his family get ahead with a lot of effort. He has a store in the center of the city where he sells telephones, accessories, and recharges. He has had his store for 8 years, and the sales are very good, as he buys directly from wholesale suppliers at cheaper prices. He also sells them at a good price, which yields a bigger income which allows him to keep moving forward.
This loan is to buy phones, replacement parts, and phone accessories. He has been with the loan group for 3 years and he likes it because he can finance his business with the loans. His dream is to have a bigger store.

loans.use: to buy telephones, replacement parts, and accessories.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La socia Eva continúa dedicándose a la venta de alimentos de primera necesidad.
La socia es trabajadora y dedicada, ya que sigue luchando por sus sueños que es  ampliar su negocio.
La socia solicito el préstamo 
Eva esta agradecida con los inversionista de KIVA por confiar en ella y se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas establecida.
texts.en: The member, Eva, continues to sell staple food items. She is hard-working and dedicated, and continues to struggle toward her dream of growing her business. The member requested the loan. Eva is grateful to Kiva's investors having confidence in her, and she is committed to making the agreed upon loan payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice and noodles.

loans.name: Upagul

texts.ru: Упагул, 41 год, замужем, 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, вот уже более 20 лет занимается выпечкой и реализацией хлеба и хлебобулочных изделий. В данное время есть товарно-материальные запасы на сумму 9,000 сом (KGS). Упагул для развития ее бизнеса, необходимо купить угля для топки печей и тандыра для выпечки хлеба и дальнейшей его реализации. Поэтому она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS). Таким образом Упагул инвестирует в развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Upagul is 41 years old, married, and has three children. She has a secondary education. She has more than 20 years of experience in baking and selling bread and baked goods. Currently, she has inventory worth 9,000 som (KGS). To run her business, Upagul needs coal for heating and tandoor ovens for baking bread. So she turned to the bank Bai-Tushum for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS). This way Upagul can invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy coal for baking traditional bread.

loans.name: Aisaltan

texts.ru: Айсалтан, 61 год, замужем, она живет с супругом, сыном и его семьей, растут двое внуков. У Айсалтан средне-специальное образование, она на пенсии. В качестве дохода для своей семьи, с 1980 года занимается сельским хозяйством, начав этот бизнес с 5,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Айсалтан есть 2 коровы, лошадь, 40 овец. На участке мерою 3,20 Га собственной земли она выращивает кукурузу, пшеницу и клевер для реализации. Вся экологически чистая продукция Айсалтан пользуется большим спросом и приносит хорошую прибыль в размере около 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айсалтан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса и воспитание внуков.
texts.en: Aisaltan is 61 years old and married. She lives with her husband and son along with his family including two grandchildren. Aisaltan has a vocational education.  She is retired. Since 1980 she has worked in agriculture. She started this business with 5,000 som (KGS). Aisaltan has two cows, a horse, and forty sheep. She owns a ​​3.20 hectare plot of land where she grows corn, wheat and clover for feed. Aisaltan's organic crops are in great demand and brings in a good income of about 13,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, she asked the bank Bai -Tushum for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy heifers to increase her livestock. Aisaltan plans to invest profits from the loan in further expanding her business and raising her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy one heifer in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Elias

texts.en:
Elias is 32 years old, married to Elizeba, and blessed with two children aged 7 years and 10 months old. He has been running an agro-vet business for 10 years and earns a monthly income of KES 13,000.

This being his second loan with VisionFund Kenya, he intends to buy pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, and hybrid vegetable and maize seeds to sell in his shop.

With the anticipated profits, he will be able pay fees for his children as well as repay his loan. His hopes and dreams for the future are to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, and hybrid vegetable and maize seeds to sell in his shop.

loans.name: Eubelen

texts.en:
Eubelen is 40 years old and married with one child. She helps her husband by buying harvested fruits from the villagers and selling them to the market while also working hand in hand with her husband on their own farm.

Eubelen has been doing this for many years. With her earnings, she was able to put up a small sari-sari store in front of her house. She joined GDMPC and asked for a loan to buy organic fertilizer in order to improve the farm, and she successfully repaid it. Now she is availing herself of a new loan to buy additional goods to sell in her sari-sari store.

Eubelen is hoping to earn more profit to improve the quality of life for her family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy additional goods to sell in her store.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, de 49 años de edad, no estudio, está casado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y tienen  4 hijos de los cuales solamente dos viven con ellos en la casa.

Miguel, es agricultor, se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde hace 35 años, esta actividad la aprendió de su padre que desde pequeño le enseño a sembrar maíz, frijol, maicillo y ajonjolí.- Esta es la única actividad que tiene para sostener a su familia y su lugar de trabajo está a 4 kilómetros desde donde vive y su horario de trabajo es de 5 a 6 horas al día

Miguel, necesita el préstamo para comprar un ternero (bovino) porque tiene uno y desea comprar otro para formar la pareja y trabajar con ellos. 

Miguel, sueña con comprar su propio terreno para trabajar en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Miguel, 49 years old, didn't study; he is married. His partner works as a homemaker and they have 4 children, two live with them in the house. Miguel is a farmer. He's been working in this activity for 35 years. He learned this activity from his father who, since he was a boy, taught him to plant corn, beans, sorghum and sesame. This is the only activity that he has to sustain his family. Their place of work is 4 kilometers from where he lives and his work schedule is 5 to 6 hours a day.

Miguel needs the loan to buy a bovine calf because he has one and wishes to buy another to form the pair and work with them. Miguel dreams of buying his own land to work in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy a bovine calf.

loans.name: Tagoygul

texts.ru: Это дама с красивой улыбкой Тагойгул. Она замечательная женщина. Тагойгул 54 летняя мать одного сына. Мужу 66 лет. Сыну 26, а невестке 22 года. Сын Тагойгул работает юристом на районе Хуросон. Сама Тагойгул хочет заниматься животноводством. У нее большая желания выращивать скота. Ее родители раньше занимались скотоводством. Тагойгул научилась в детстве. Теперь она хочет продвигать деятельность родителей. У нее имеется  не большой коровник. Тагойгул решила взять кредит и приобрести пару голов скота и начать свой бизнес. Путем этой работы Тагойгул сможет зарабатывать и обеспечить семью. С такими планами Тагойгул обратилась за кредитом. Она очень надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: This is a lady with a beautiful smile named Tagoygul. She's a wonderful woman. Tagoygul is 54 years old and the mother of one son. Her husband is 66 years old. Her son is 26 and daughter is 22. Her son is a lawyer in Khuroson. Tagoygul wants to work in animal husbandry. She would really like to raise cattle. Her parents used to breed cattle. Tagoygul learned the skill in childhood. Now, she wants to follow in her parents' footsteps. She has a small barn. Tagoygul decided to take out a loan and buy a few head of cattle and start a business. With this work, Tagoygul would be able to earn money and provide for her family. Hence, Tagoygul applied for a loan. She has high hopes for your support.

loans.use: buy two head of cattle.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
La socia Patricia pertenece al banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la ciudad del Cusco.
La socia Patricia continúa dedicándose a realizar diseños publicitarios, la socia es una mujer responsable, la socia espera que mediante su negocio pueda obtener más ganancias para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia se siente agradecida  con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas, a la vez continua dedicándose a la elaboración  de tortas entre otros.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra harina, azúcar entre otros insumos.
texts.en:
Patricia is a member of the communal bank “Patrón de San Sebastián” of the city of Cusco.

Patricia continues to work creating advertising designs. She is a responsible woman who hopes to obtain more profit through her business, so that she can continue to help her family. 

She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay the installments through her work making cakes and the like. Patricia is requesting the loan in order to buy flour, sugar and other ingredients.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Damari Magali

texts.es: Damari es una microempresaria exitosa de 27 años de edad, acompañada y madre de dos hijos de 10 y 8 años, quienes son su inspiración para salir adelante en la vida. Su negocio es la venta de ropa y zapatos desde hace tres años, solicitando por cuarto ciclo financiamiento en la institución para la compra de camisas, pantalones, faldas y chores. Una de sus metas es mejorar la construcción de su vivienda, con las ganancias de créditos anteriores logro la compra de un televisor y una refrigeradora.
texts.en:
Damari is a successful microentrepreneur, 27 years old, partnered and mother of two children, aged 10 and 8, who are her inspiration for getting ahead in life. Her business is the sale of clothing and shoes for the past three years.

She is applying for the fourth loan cycle in the institution to buy shirts, pants, dresses and shorts. One of her goals is to improve the construction of her home. With the earnings from the previous loans she achieved buying a television and refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, dresses and shorts.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is 26 years old. He operates a barber shop at Kilifi, Kenya, and has done for the last seven years, doing well. He is a father of two, and his wife is a tailor who provides additional income.

This is his fourth time borrowing from VisionFund Kenya. After successfully repaying his previous loan, he will use the money to purchase a shaving kit and disinfectants for his shop.

He plans to use the anticipated profit to educate his children and expand his business. He hopes to have a successful business and a happy family in future.

loans.use: to purchase a shaving kit and disinfectants.

loans.name: Bibiloik

texts.ru: На фотографии запечатлена Бибилоик. Ей 57 лет. Она мать троих сыновей. Мужу 59 лет. Сыновьям 26, 22 и 17 лет. У нее честный и трудолюбивый муж. Муж занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью, и свободное время помогает жене в работе. Старшие сыновья находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Они зарабатывает и отправляет деньги домой родителям. Младший сын любимчик матери. Он главный помощник Бибилоик. Сама Бибилоик дома занимается купле продажей крупнорогатого скота около 10 лет. Она покупает скота и откармливает несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. Ей в этом бизнесе нравиться то, что она может сама контролировать свой бизнес. Бибилоик хочет расширить животноводческую деятельность, путем увеличения поголовье скота. Она берет кредит, чтобы закупить несколько поголовья крупных скотов. Бибилоик хочет, чтобы Вы помогли ей расширить деятельность. Она будет рада на Вашу помощь.
texts.en: The photograph is of Bibiloik. She is 57 years old. She is the mother of three sons. Her husband is 59 years old. Her sons are 26, 22 and 17 years old. Her husband is an honest and hardworking man. Her husband farms and in his free time helps his wife at work. The older sons work in Russia. They earn and send money home to their parents. The younger son is mother's favorite. He is Bibiloik's primary helper. Bibiloik was worked buying and selling cattle for about 10 years. She buys livestock, fattens them for a few months, and then resells them in the cattle market. She likes tha fact that she can control her own business. Bibiloik wants to expand her livestock operations, by increasing the livestock. She is taking out a loan to buy more livestock. Bibiloik wants you to help her expand her business. She will be glad for your help.

loans.use: buy a few head of cattle.

loans.name: Juana Margarita

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sucre se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Juana, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 3  hijos de 19, 14 y 11 años de edad, los dos menores  estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es empleado privado. Ella estudia educación parvulario en una universidad.
Doña Juana con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos los mismos que le permiten ayudar a  su marido a afrontar los gastos del hogar y para sus gastos de sus estudios   se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo así como también  productos de Avon, Yanbal y Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella sale por la localidad y también vende en la universidad en la cual estudia,  son 6 años que lleva con este negocio el cual le permite ganar algo que lo utiliza para sus estudios esperando ser una profesional y mejorar su vida. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas y otros productos que vende. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque con los créditos ella surte más su negocio y aprovecha las ofertas. Sus sueños es ser una profesional.
texts.en:
The loan group Sucre meets every 15 days in the region of Montecristi, known for its rich precolonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are nationally and internationally recognized. It is the place of the famous hats made of straw.
Here lives Juana, she is 37 years old, she is married, and from this relationship she has 3 children who are 19, 14, and 11 years old. The two younger ones go to high school and primary school. Her husband is a private employee. She is studying to be a preschool teacher at university.
With the goal of having her own income that will allow her to help her husband to meet the household expenses and for her school expenses, Juana works in the sale of all types of clothing as well as products from Avon, Yanbal, and Belcorp (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumers, and ladies' accessories). She sells door to door and she also sells at the university where she studies. She has had this business for 6 years, which allows her to earn some money, which she uses for her studies hoping to become a professional and improve her life.
She will use this loan to buy clothing, perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, and other products that she sells. She has been with the loan group from the beginning and she likes it because with the loans she can stock her business and take advantage of the offers. Her dream is to become a professional.

loans.use: to buy clothing, perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, etc.

loans.name: Danny

texts.en: Danny is a hog raiser from Pari-an, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. This is his primary source of income. Recently, he asked Paglaum MPC for an amount to purchase bags of animal feeds.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feeds

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a vegetable retailer in Cang-inte, Siquijor. She has been in this type of business for seven years to support her husband in providing the needs of her family.

She accessed her initial capitalization from Paglaum MPC and enjoys other perks and benefits of membership, including insurance services. Recently, she asked the cooperative for a loan to buy additional vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Pedelisa

texts.en:
